Rossini overtures [Hong Kong] : Naxos Music Library, [2006] 011008 performed music prm rdacontent computer c rdamedia online resource cr rdacarrier Streaming audio. Title from image of compact disc cover on Web page (viewed May 10, 2006). Digital recording ; digitally remastered. Includes program notes. La gazza ladra = The thieving magpie (10:02) -- Il barbiere di Siviglia = The barber of Seville (7:39) -- La Cenerentola = Cinderella (8:25) -- Semiramide = Semiramis (12:51) -- La scala di seta = The silken ladder (6:20) -- L'Italiana in Algeri = The Italian girl in Algiers (7:59) -- Il Signor Bruschino = Signor Bruschino (4:45) -- Guillaume Tell = William Tell (12:07). Digital content provided by Naxos Music Library; access may be restricted to users at subscribing institutions. Zagreb Festival Orchestra ; Michael Halàsz, conductor. Recorded at the Lisinski Concert Hall in Zagreb from 9th to 11th January 1989. Also available as compact disc; previously issued as Naxos 8.550236. Mode of access: World Wide Web. System requirements: MS Windows 98SE, or 2000, or XP; MS Internet Explorer 6.0, Mozilla 1.7.1, FireFox 1PR, Netscape 7.1, or Opera 7.53; and Media Player 9 or 10. System requirements: Macintosh: Mac OS X 10.2.8 or 10.3.5; MS Internet Explorer 5.2, Mozilla 1.7, Netscape 7.1, Opera 7.53, or Safari 1.0; Media Player 9.0.
